title: Claustrophobic and intense
review: Seeing 'The Blair Witch Project' for the first time is the same as seeing it for the seventh. I watched it again last night, and it evoked the same unsettling, disturbing raw emotions that it did when I saw it in the theater. By now, the premise has been told to death. All I'm going to say is if you're looking for a low-budget horror film with no gore, startling moments, and a taut and suspenseful ending, then this is the one to watch on a lonely night...with the lights out...in the dark...alone...
